fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the ability of any non-killing role in the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Snail (2719) will always spawn and you are alerted if they are in a neighboring house. If it visits you, you lose your defense and die.
- You also lose your defense and die if you visit the Snail.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.
